predicate.note: Frames file for 'possess' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry (!!!!), Framenet entry Possession.

example.name: straight transitive
example.text: But Mr. Hahn rose swiftly through the ranks, demonstrating a raw intelligence that he says he knew he possessed *trace* early on.

example.name: prepositional variant
example.text: His answer is one ``possessed *trace* of a dignity in keeping with his position.''
example.arg: a dignity in keeping with his position

example.name: not sure if this is the same roleset
example.text: John is possessed *trace* by evil spirits. Mostly tequila.
